name: Genius Coin
description: Genius is a deflationary token created, with Static Rewards, LP Acquisition and Manual Burn, by a team of experts (Dev, Trader, Marketer and Economist) that aims to literally change the world. It was made to revolutionize the financial system via an eco friendly platform. The platform will be launched and community will have the power over Genius projects that will take place in the real world. Genius holders will be able to stake Genius on the platform to fund eco friendly projects. For the first time in crypto, community will be a real family.
